body_html:
We've actually just published an initial aar yesterday: https://bintray.com/google/tensorflow/tensorflow-aar/1.2.0-preview#files

We'll be updating the Gradle code in the Android demo soon to show how to use it.

Plans going forward are to update this on every point release as part of the release process.

body:
We've actually just published an initial aar yesterday: https://bintray.com/google/tensorflow/tensorflow-aar/1.2.0-preview#files

We'll be updating the Gradle code in the Android demo soon to show how to use it.

Plans going forward are to update this on every point release as part of the release process.
